note:
Extreme Home Solutions, LLC is a real estate solutions company based out of Stone Mountain.  We’re a family owned business and focus on helping homeowners like you find solutions for your problem whether you’re going through a foreclosure, can’t sell your property, or just need to sell your house for any kind of reason.  Our CEO is Michael Ramsay and he has been helping homeowners in the Metro-Atlanta area for the past 20 years.
https://www.atlantamikebuyhouses.com/
